item.description:
Sweet Summer Nights at Sweetwilliam Farm
Enjoy a fun, relaxing evening listening to the music of Steve Hurl, a unique, compelling songwriter who mixes contemporary folk with traditional acoustic blues and folk styles from around the globe. www.stevehurl.com

This is our favorite place to sit outside and listen to great music. The farm is set on top of a hill with great views and a peaceful, serene feeling. You will also enjoy browsing their quaint country store.

Feel free to bring your own food and beverages (alcohol is allowed).
Great food is also available for sale: burgers, dogs, pizza and ice cream.

Bring a chair or use one of theirs.
Be sure to bring a sweater - it's gets chilly as soon as that sun goes down.
Sorry - no dogs allowed.

There is no charge for this event, but donations are appreciated for the entertainment.

For Directions, click here:
http://www.sweetwilli...
My cell is 508-381-1529.

More about the entertainment:
Steve Hurl is a nimble guitarist with an accomplished finger-picking technique which allows him to play driving rhythms and elaborate melodies at the same time. His lyrics are sometimes satirical, sometimes sweet, and he sings with an essential blues-y edge...www.stevehurl.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Jacki in her purple chair and rainbow umbrella.
item.name: Sunset Concert at Sweetwilliam Farm - Upton
